```{r load.data, echo=FALSE}
pm.mash.beta.brain=read.table("../Data/Aug13withEDposterior.betas.txt")
pm.mash=read.table("../withoutbrain//nobrainposterior.means.txt")[,-1]
standard.error=read.table("../Data/standard.error.txt")[,-c(7:16)]
pm.mash.beta=pm.mash*standard.error
components=read.table("../Data/maxColsums.txt")[,1]
```

```{r,fig.ext='png',cache=TRUE}

for (i in 1:43){
  for(j in (i+1):44){
    plot(pm.mash.beta.brain[,i],pm.mash.beta.brain[,j],col=components,xlab=colnames(pm.mash.beta.brain)[i],ylab=colnames(pm.mash.beta.brain)[j])}}
  
```
